AND &
OR |
NOT ~
XOR ^
BITSHIFT << ou >>

1o -> 3lsb
00000000000000000000000000000111

2o -> 8lsb
00000000000000000000000011111111

3o -> 5lsb
00000000000000000000000000011111

4o -> 5lsb
00000000000000000000000000011111

5o -> 11lsb
00000000000000000000011111111111

ordem:
5 (21 a 31); 4 (16 a 20); 3 (11 a 15); 2 (3 a 10); 1 (0 a 2)

"SDDDD SDDDD SDDDD SDDDD SDDDD\n"
0, 6, 12, 18, 24
